subject: Horse Racing
Cruelty to Animals
lead_paragraph: A court hearing in Greene County, N.Y., was postponed for Ernie Paragallo, a prominent thoroughbred breeder charged with cruelty after scores of malnourished horses were found on his farm. Paragallo was to appear in Coxsackie Town Court, but a clerk said the hearing was postponed at the request of his lawyer. A new date had not been set.
